title: Seances - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/7/21
itunes:title: Seances - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/7/21
description:
George Noory and married psychic mediums Kat and Dan Eckhart explore their rituals to contact the spirits of the dead, her career as a witch, and their work with the death positivity movement to prepare people for their inevitable death.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
